TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions, class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplateHost, class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor
Public Class DynamicControl Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, IFieldFormattingOptions, IFieldTemplateHost
public ref class DynamicControl : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldFormattingOptions, System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplateHost, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor
type DynamicControl = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface IFieldTemplateHost interface IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 使用 ASP.NET 动态数据功能，在模板化数据绑定控件中显示为字段定义的内容。

span.span: Displays the content that is defined for the field in templated data-bound controls, using ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 模板化数据绑定控件 ( 如或) 使用控件来显示在自定义页中使用ASP.NET动态数据功能的数据字段。The control is used by templated data-bound controls, such as or , to display a data field that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in a custom page. 您还可以在或控件的字段中使用控件。You can also use a control in a field of a or a control. 控件提供类似于字段的功能。 The control provides functionality that is similar to that of the field. 但是, 因为控件仅用于模板内, 所以它使您可以更灵活地控制数据的显示方式, 因为您可以在该字段周围添加其他 HTML 元素。However, because the control is only used inside templates, it gives you more flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed since you can add other HTML elements around the field. 使用控件时, 可以利用以下动态数据功能:When you use a control, you can take advantage of the following Dynamic Data features: - 根据数据类型, 使用字段模板自动呈现字段的适当控件。Automatically rendering the proper control for a field by using field templates, based on the data type. 可针对整个应用程序全局修改字段模板。The field templates can be globally modified for the entire application. - 基于数据库架构提供内置数据验证。Providing built-in data validation based on the database schema. 您还可以通过自定义数据模型来添加验证类型。You can also add validation types by customizing the data model. - 通过使用数据模型中的属性或使用属性, 自定义单个字段的数据呈现。Customizing data rendering for individual fields by using attributes in the data model or by using the property. 若要指定要在控件中显示的字段, 请将属性设置为字段名称。To specify the field to display in a control, set the property to the field name. 可以通过设置属性, 将自定义格式设置字符串应用于字段值。You can apply a custom formatting string to the field value by setting the property. 默认情况下, 仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式时, 才将格式设置字符串应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时显示的值, 请将属性设置`true`为。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如果字段值为`null`, 则可以通过设置属性来显示自定义标题。If a field value is `null`, you can display a custom caption by setting the property. 通过 `true`将属性设置为, 该控件还可以自动将空字符串 ("") 字段值转换为 null 值。 The control can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the property to `true`. 该控件支持不同的显示模式。The control supports different display modes. 若要指定控件的显示模式, 请设置属性。To specify the mode in which to display the control, set the property. 下表显示了不同的模式。The following table shows the different modes. 用于显示模式。for display mode. 这可防止用户修改记录或数据字段的值。This prevents the user from modifying the values of a record or a data field. 它可以在任何模板中使用。It can be used in any of the templates. 对于编辑模式。for edit mode. 这使用户可以更新现有记录的值。This enables users to update the values of an existing record. 它用于编辑模板 (通常名为`EditItemTemplate`)。It is used in the edit template (typically named `EditItemTemplate`). 对于插入模式。for insert mode. 这使用户可以为新记录输入值。This enables users to enter values for a new record. 它用于插入模板 (通常名为`InsertItemTemplate`)。It is used in the insert template (typically named `InsertItemTemplate`). 可以通过 将属性设置为来`false`隐藏数据绑定控件中的控件。You can hide a control in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 请参阅此功能的运行时代码示例:[运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl). 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件中的控件来显示、插入、删除和编辑数据库表中的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the control in a control to display, insert, delete and edit values from a database table. 请务必注意, 若要使插入操作正常运行 , 则`rowguid`和`ModifiedDate`列的属性将设置为`true`。It is important to notice that in order to make the insert operation to work, the property of the `rowguid` and `ModifiedDate` columns are set to `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示字段处于编辑模式时，是否将 属性指定的格式设置字符串应用于字段值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the field is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果应用格式设置字符串，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the formatting string is applied; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件具有不同的显示模式, 使用户能够读取、编辑或插入字段。The control has different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert a field. 默认情况下, 仅 当控件处于只读模式时, 属性指定的格式设置字符串才应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string specified by the property is applied to a field value only when the control is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时显示的值, 请将属性设置`true`为。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 当数据源中的字段被更新时, 控件不会自动删除该格式。The control does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source. 如果不希望格式设置为存储的值的一部分, 则需要以编程方式删除格式设置。If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.

summary.span: 获取或设置与控件关联的列对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the column object that is associated with the control.

value.span: 与控件关联的列对象。

span.span: The column object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性来获取有关特定列的元数据信息。You can use the property to obtain metadata information about a specific column. 此属性由控件根据为属性提供的字段名称自动设置。The property is automatically set by the control based on the field name provided for the property.

member this.ConvertEmptyStringToNull : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值 ("") 自动转换为 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 如果将空字符串值自动转换为 null 值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if empty string values are automatically converted to null values; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件的对象还具有一个名为的属性。The object of the data source control also has a property named . 此属性执行相同的功能。This property performs the same function. 请确保这两个属性都已正确设置。Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件绑定到的数据字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field that the control is bound to.

value.span: 要将 控件绑定到的数据字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the data field to bind the control to.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要绑定到控件的数据字段。 Use the property to specify the data field to bind to the control. 数据字段可以是列名称, 也可以是用于外键列的关系名称。The data field can be the column name or, for foreign key columns, the relationship name. 默认情况下, 控件使用与字段数据类型关联的字段模板来显示指定的数据字段。By default, the specified data field is displayed by the control using the field template that is associated with the field data type. 通过设置属性, 可以更改为数据字段呈现的字段模板。You can change the field template that is rendered for the data field by setting the property. 还可以通过设置属性来设置显示的文本的格式。You can also format the displayed text by setting the property. **注意**如果要全局更改数据字段的显示和行为, 则必须将属性应用于数据模型, 而不是在控件的特定实例中对其进行设置。**Note** If you want to change the display and behavior of a data field globally, you must apply attributes to your data model instead of setting this in a particular instance of the control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定要在控件中显示的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定字段值的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 指定字段值的显示格式的格式化字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为控件中显示的值指定自定义的显示格式。 Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values displayed in the control. 如果未设置该属性, 则显示字段值而不进行任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the field value is displayed without any special formatting. 默认情况下, 仅当属性设置为时, 才将格式设置字符串应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the property is set to . 若要在编辑模式下将格式设置字符串应用于字段值, 请将属性`true`设置为。To apply the formatting string to the field value while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 使用属性指定的显示格式特定于控件的此实例。The display format that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the control. 您还可以通过将应用于数据模型并在构造函数中设置命名参数, 来更改整个应用程序中的数据字段的显示格式。You can also change the display format for a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model and setting the named parameter in the constructor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512).

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件的数据在呈现之前是否经过 HTML 编码。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data for the control is HTML-encoded before rendering.

value.span: 如果控件的数据在呈现之前经过 HTML 编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data for the control is HTML-encoded before rendering; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定在显示字段值之前, 这些字段值是否经过 HTML 编码。Use the property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed. > [!NOTE] > HTML 编码字段值有助于防止显示跨站点脚本攻击和恶意内容。HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed. 应尽可能启用此属性。This property should be enabled whenever possible. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode Mode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置呈现模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the rendering mode.

value.span: 指定控件的呈现模式的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the rendering mode for the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要用于显示控件的呈现模式。 Use the property to specify which rendering mode to use to display the control. 下表显示了不同的模式。The following table shows the different modes. |模式Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||用于显示模式。for display mode. 这可防止用户修改记录或数据字段的值。This prevents the user from modifying the values of a record or a data field. 它可以在任何模板中使用。It can be used in any of the templates. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||对于编辑模式。for edit mode. 这使用户可以更新现有记录的值。This enables users to update the values of an existing record. 它在`EditItemTemplate`模板中使用。It is used in the `EditItemTemplate` template.| ||对于插入模式。for insert mode. 这使用户可以为新记录输入值。This enables users to enter values for a new record. 它在`InsertItemTemplate`模板中使用。It is used in the `InsertItemTemplate` template.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NullDisplayText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NullDisplayText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当字段值为 时，为数据字段显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 当字段值为 时，为数据字段显示的标题。

span.span: The caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时, 字段值在数据源中存储为 null。Sometimes a field value is stored as null in the data source. 通过设置属性, 可以为具有 null 值的字段指定要显示的自定义标题。You can specify a custom caption to display for fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未设置此属性, 则 null 字段值显示为空字符串 ("")。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: The property is not set.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于呈现数据字段的字段模板的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field template that is used to render the data field.

value.span: 用于呈现数据字段的字段模板的名称。

span.span: The name of the field template that is used to render the data field.

value.span: 默认值是空字符串 ("")，指示将基于数据字段类型或应用于数据模型的元数据信息，来呈现字段模板。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the field template will be rendered based on the data field type or on metadata information applied to the data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定用于显示数据字段的 UI 的字段模板。Use the property to specify the field template to use to display the UI for a data field. 默认情况下, 字段模板是用户控件, 它们的名称包含一个后缀, 用于标识用于编辑操作和插入操作的字段模板。Field templates by default are user controls and their names contain a suffix to identify field templates that are used for edit operations and insert operations. 后缀分别为 "_insert" 和 ""。The suffixes are _edit and _insert, respectively. 将值设置为属性时, 请设置不带后缀的名称。When you set a value to the property, you set the name without the suffixes. 动态数据将通过评估属性值标识正确的模式, 并将呈现正确的字段模板。Dynamic Data will identify the correct mode by evaluating the property value and will render the correct field template. 如果未设置该属性, 则默认情况下动态数据将基于字段类型呈现字段模板。If the property is not set, by default Dynamic Data will render the field template based on the field type. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据基架](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12). 使用属性指定的字段模板特定于该控件的实例。The field template that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the control. 您还可以通过将应用于数据模型来更改数据字段在整个应用程序中使用的字段模板。You can also change the field template used by a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model. 设置属性将重写应用于数据模型的元数据。Setting the property overrides the metadata applied to the data model. 有关元数据属性的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information about metadata attributes, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). ## Examples 请参阅此功能的运行时代码示例:[运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint). 下面的示例演示如何指定数据字段, 以使用不同的字段模板来呈现其内容。The following example shows how you can specify a data field to use a different field template to render its contents. 第二个示例显示由属性指定的自定义字段模板。The second example shows the custom field template specified by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/VB/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/CS/Email.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/VB/Email.ascx#2)]

related.span: ASP.NET 动态数据模型概述

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Model Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的验证组名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the validation group name for the control.

value.span: 控件的验证组名称。

span.span: The validation group name for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定当页面回发到服务器时, 控件引发验证的验证组的名称。 Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when the page posts back to the server.
